body.name: USB C Port Hardwire Kit for Dash Camera, Type C Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Converts 12V-24V to 5V/3A Car Dashcam Charger Cable Kit, Low Voltage Protection (11.5ft)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 10 mins
features: 【USB C Wide Compatibility】11.5ft Type-C cable hardwire kit is suitable for most car models (Voltage between 12-24V). And it compatible with voltage from any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, such as dash cam, mirror cam, GPS navigator and radar detector etc. Please note that the fuse type for the usb c cable kit is Micro fuses taps.

【24 Hours Parking Surveillance】The Type-C vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. The dash cam switches to parking surveillance mode automatically when your turn off the car engine, and switches back to normal recording when on.

【Low Voltage Protection】Type-C Hardwire kit have multiple security protection - with low voltage protection. It has a smart low voltage protection system monitor the car battery voltage in real time that will automatically shut off the power to your dash cam when the battery voltage drops to 11.8V or 23.6V.

【Easy to Use & Power Supplying】type-C Hardwire Kit is connected to car battery, it is a hidden cable very easy to install. Also it can turn on and off with the ignition and continuous supply power for dash cam when the car is turned off.

【Worry-free Shopping】Type-C hardwire kit ensures reliable quality and professional customer service. Please feel free to contact us for assistance or free replacement. Do not need to worry about the time-limited return window, if any issues happen after purchasing.
body.description: Key Features Ideal for all Type-C port dash cam!24 hours parking surveillance with low voltage protection.Compatible with any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, such as dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc.Low voltage protection protect your dash cam, automatically shut off the power to your dash cam when the battery voltage drops to 11.8V or 23.6V.If you do not have the experience on installing the hardwire kit for dash cam, please ask for the professional. What's in the box? BUNUD 11.5ft Type-C Dash Cam Hardwire Kit with Installation Instruction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 24 Hours Parking Surveillance The Type C vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. Low voltage protection Type C hardwire kit has a smart low voltage protection system monitor the car battery voltage in real time that will automatically shut off the power to your dash cam when the battery voltage drops to 11.8V or 23.6V. Compatible 12V-24V Vehicles Our Type C hardwire kit works for almost all car mini USB device, accepts voltage from any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, such as dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc. High Quality Copper Conductor 3.5 meters hard wire set flexibility is not easy to break, which has a very good transmission function.

Connect the Red Wire The Red wire (ACC), needs to connect with Fuse Box ACC, which can make the dash cam auto power on&off when the vehicle is on&off. Connect the Yellow Wire The Yellow wire (BAT+), needs to connect with constant fuse, which can provide power to dash cam even when the vehicle is off. Connect the Ground Wire The Black wire (GND), needs to connect with metal bolt or screw, which can prevent electric shock.

Key Features Ideal for all Type-C port dash cam!24 hours parking surveillance with low voltage protection.Compatible with any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, such as dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc.Low voltage protection protect your dash cam, automatically shut off the power to your dash cam when the battery voltage drops to 11.8V or 23.6V.If you do not have the experience on installing the hardwire kit for dash cam, please ask for the professional. What's in the box? BUNUD 11.5ft Type-C Dash Cam Hardwire Kit with Installation Instruction. Product Details Connector: Type-C Connector Input Voltage: DC 12V-24V Output Voltage: 5V Output Current: 3A Cable Length: 11.5ft/3.5m Low Voltage Protection: 11.8V for 12V vehicle; 23.6V for 24V vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be careful about this one!
reviews.reviewText: This might be a good product for your vehicle/dashcam, but for me its a hard pass. My first issue is fuse type compatibility. There are at least 4 different types of fuses for cars: ACZ(micro2), ACS(mini), ACN(LP-mini) and ACU(ATO) . This product uses type ACS but my car is ACU. My bad for not paying better attention to this before ordering. This is showstopper #1 for me. The design is also is assuming you have an open slot in your fusebox - as these are not piggyback leads. showstopper #2. Examination of the product reveals that the fuses are permanently attached to the leads (glued?). If an electrical problem occurs on your dashcam, the fuse will blow ( as it should !) but there is no way to replace the blown fuse once the electrical problem is corrected. You will need to replace the hardwire kit. Expense and hassle of reinstall. showstopper #3. This one is being returned. Edit: I added two stars to the rating as the customer service team proactively contacted me after the initial review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These only come with Mini sized fuse ends. would be nice if they specified that
reviews.reviewText: this item does not supply the multiple type fuse ends, these options are important in case you do not know what type of fuse you have. nowhere in the description for this item does it say what size fuse ends come with it. They are mini type fuses in the one I got. Who knows if this is random or not because the item description does not say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No second fuse
reviews.reviewText: didnt catch that these only have a built in fuse and not one you can replace.. horrible design.. had t cut the ends off and add in my own fuse tap so i could make sure things were protected correctly.
